name: Spy & Sheep: Heist for Lhã
description:
Our game is a local co-op adventure for 2 players at a time. The theme is inspired in the museum located in our city Covilhã where the Game Jam had place. One player is a human spy while the other is a sheep.

Player 1: Move (AWSD), Run faster (R), Grab itens (Left Shift)

Player 2: Move (Keys), Activate skill (C - but can only be used after picking the first 2 itens, sorry for the spoiler since there's no clue in game for now), Grab Itens (Right Shift)
